title: Reactive Programming
subtext: Handling data streams and changes in real time
author: Buzzpy

description.title: Reactive Programming
texts: Reactive Programming is a way to handle data streams and changes in real time. It's like making sure your app can react instantly to user inputs, like a game that updates immediately when you press a button.
Imagine Reactive Programming as being able to respond quickly to events, just like a reflex.
